#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define scan(x) scanf("%d",&x)
#define print(x) printf("%d\n",x)
 
int main(){
 
	int t;
	scan(t);
	while(t--){
		int p1,p2;
		scan(p1),scan(p2);
		p2-=p1;
		int n;
		scan(n);
		int P[n],W[n];
		for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
			scan(P[i]),scan(W[i]);
			bool V[p2+1];
			int val[p2+1];
			memset(V,0,sizeof(V));
			V[0]=1;
			val[0]=0;
			for(int i=1;i<=p2;i++)
				val[i]=INT_MAX;
 
			for(int i=1;i<=p2;i++){
				for(int j=0;j<n;j++){
					if(i>=W[j]&&V[i-W[j]]){
						V[i]=1;
						val[i]=min(val[i],val[i-W[j]]+P[j]);
					}
				}
			}
			if(V[p2]){
				printf("The minimum amount of money in the piggy-bank is %d.\n",val[p2]);
			}else{
				printf("This is impossible.\n");
			}
 
	}
	return 0;
}
